name: Javascript File Browser
desc: Created for aWhere Inc, this client-side file browser is designed to access an Nginx server and list the contents of a directory. Building the browser in Javascript allowed it to integrate with the rest of aWhere's web services.

name: API Call Chart
desc: Created for aWhere Inc, this web app allows the user to view API usage history.

name: Python Photoshop Editor
desc: A Python script to bulk create D&D monster cards by interfacing with Photoshop. The script is able to edit text and activate / deactivate Photoshop layers.

name: Raspberry Pi Donkey Car
desc: A small group research project that evaluated the performance of a Pi-controlled RC car with open-source Python AI libraries
